html:
We have a strong city -In opposition to the city of the enemy, which God hath destroyed, Isaiah 25:1-12; (note). See the note there.

Salvation - for walls and bulwarks -וחל חומת chomsoth vachel, walls and redoubts, or the walls and the ditch. חל chel properly signifies the ditch or trench without the wall; see Kimchi. The same rabbin says, This song refers to the time of salvation, i.e., the days of the Messiah.
